channel.title: [SFM] Secret Murderers?~The Town, the Paranoid, And the Survivor win!
channel.description:
[color=lightgreen]Welcome[/color] = Hello folks and welcome to Secret Murderers! **100% not bastard I swear!**
Hosted by HTM and MTheJoker
[color=lightgreen] Rules:[/color] =
[details="Rules!"] 1. Follow the Global Forum Rules 2. If you haven’t posted content in 36 hours, you’ll be prodded for inactivity. If you don’t respond to that prod in 16 hours, you will be force replaced. 3. No private messaging others in the game about the game. 4. Do not screenshot private host messages 5. Don’t throw the game. This includes any form of intent to make you or your faction lose 6. Do not use me or M's big boi letters or me colorz 7. Editing is allowed if you are correcting grammar mistakes other than that you need me permission. If you edit before the pen you are ~~spared~~ ok. Also no deleting posts. 8. You can edit quotes for the lulz but other than that no. [/details]
[color=lightgreen] Unoffcial Rules:[/color] =
[details="Unofficial Rules!"] 1. You ~~can~~ can't Angleshoot! 2. Don't annoy people try to quote things from the dead or ~~modkill~~ [/details]
[color=lightgreen]Gameplay:[/color] =
[details=Gameplay!] [details="Day/Night Stuff"] * Days will be 72 hours long, or shorter if someone dies * Nights will be 24 hour long, or shorter if everyone sent their actions in * There will be 3 events going on throughout the day [/details]
[details="Class Stuff"] * Actions are done by messaging me * All classes will be used, and will be used as they are found in your PM * All classes are hidden. The Rolelist is some what hidden too * When you receive a card you will have 24 hours to reply, confirming you have received it * Normal win cons are in place (town, defeat all who seek to harm the town, etc.) [/details]
[details="Lynch Stuff"] * To accuse someone say "**/accuse [player]**" or "**/vote [player]**" * To unaccuse someone say "/**unvote [player]**" or "**/unvote**" * Majority lynch is in play since EoD lynch takes a really long time * There are no trials however [/details]
[details="Journals/Deathnotes"] * Message me your entire journal/DN, the last draft I receive before you die/kill shall be the one displayed [/details] [/details]
[color=lightgreen]To Join[/color] = To join, simply express interest in joining by saying something like "I want to join" or "/join" or "/in" or "sign me up, coach" or whatever you want
Rolelist:
**[color=green] Unknown Random Town [/color]** **[color=green] Unknown Random Town [/color]** **[color=green] Unknown Random Town[/color]** **[color=green] Unknown Random Town[/color]** **[color=green] Unknown Random Town[/color]** **[color=green]Unknown Random Town[/color]** **[color=green]Unknown Random Town[/color]** **[color=green]Unknown Random Town[/color]** **[color=green]Unknown Random Town[/color]** **[color=brown] Unknown Mystery[/color]** **[color=brown] Unknown Mystery[/color]** **[color=brown] Unknown Mystery[/color]** **[color=brown] Unknown Mystery [/color]** **[color=brown] Unknown Mystery[/color]** **[color=brown] Unknown Mystery [/color]**
Btw these Unknown Mysteries could be mafia or town or neutrals
Players: We can start at 12 too if we don't get enough players. We can have more players too
1. FK -> Hipp0 -> Simon :dizzy: 2. ~~MaximusPrime~~ 3. ~~Memesky~~ 4. Omfgcookies 6. Hippolytus 8. ~~Margaret~~ 9. ~~Soulshade55r~~ 12. Solic 1. ~~Psychoneirik~~ 1. ~~Blizer~~ 1. ~~Light_Ethos~~ -> ~~Shurian~~ 1. ~~ConfustoLook~~ 1. ~~Boss110~~ :dizzy: 1. ~~Captain~~ 1. ~~CloverPlayer~~
Survivors: 1. Cookies is the Paranoid (kinda MVP to town) 2. Solic is the Detective 3. Simon is the Medic
Graveyard:
:coffin: Blizer - lynched D1, was [color=bloweeeeeee] Hangman [/color] :coffin: Captain - Dayvigged by FK D2, was [color=lightpink] Survivor [/color] :coffin: Boss110 - Died in Dungeon D2, was [color=green] Jailord[/color] :coffin: Soul - Lynched D2, was [color=green] Veteran [/color] :coffin: Clover - Died N2, was [color=green] Companion [/color] :coffin: Meme - Taken away by the litten dragons D3, was [color=green] Crier [/color] :coffin: Marg - Lynched D3, was [color=dayellow] Judge [/color]
[color=lightgreen]**Game Events:**[/color] = [Rolling Classcards!](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sfm-secret-murderers-confirmation-stage-15-15/67176/282?u=htm) [Confirmation Stage!](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sfm-secret-murderers-confirmation-stage-15-15/67176/310?u=htm) [End Of The Confirmation Stage And Start Of Day 1!](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sfm-secret-murderers-night-1-14-15-the-tragic-tale-of-bliz-the-hangman/67176/324?u=htm) [First Event, D1, Get Your Candies!](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sfm-secret-murderers-day-2-14-15-gifts-for-all/67176/660?u=htm) [The Tragic Lynching Of Blizer The Hangman. End Of D1 And Start Of N1!](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sfm-secret-murderers-day-2-14-15-gifts-for-all/67176/1103?u=htm) [Discobot's Possession Of HTM. 2nd Event, Disco's ~~Murdering~~ Life Saving Chance. Start of D2!](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sfm-secret-murderers-day-2-14-15-gifts-for-all/67176/1108?u=htm) [Disco Leaves Me Be. 3rd Event: Giving Gifts Is ~~Murdering~~ Fun!](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sfm-secret-murderers-day-2-14-15-gifts-for-all/67176/1768?u=htm) [Darkness Message?](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sfm-secret-murderers-day-2-14-15-gifts-for-all/67176/1940?u=htm) [Confusto has betrayed the :wink: ](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sfm-secret-murderers-day-2-14-15-gifts-for-all/67176/2001?u=htm) [Curse of :wink: is broken!!! ](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sfm-secret-murderers-day-2-14-15-gifts-for-all/67176/2018?u=htm) [Solic Has Dayvigged Marg! Marg's Immune?](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sfm-secret-murderers-day-2-13-15-captains-dreams-have-come-true-he-didnt-have-a-tragic-story/67176/2210?u=htm) [Another Curse Is Broken!? This Time By Clover!](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sfm-secret-murderers-day-2-13-15-captains-dreams-have-come-true-he-didnt-have-a-tragic-story/67176/2211?u=htm) [Captain Victory! Also Captain Got Shot By FK](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sfm-secret-murderers-day-2-12-15-bosss-sad-dungeon-death/67176/2521?u=htm) [~~Stealing~~ Borrowing Captain's Stuff! Note Found In His Home!](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sfm-secret-murderers-day-2-12-15-bosss-sad-dungeon-death/67176/2532?u=htm)
Too lazy soz
